Fine spirits – Explore and buy online at Flaviar

Oban 14 Year Old
A fan-favourite from one of the oldest Scotch distilleries, Oban 14 tells a tale of its seaside home in every sip. Reflecting the rough rocky shores of “The Gateway to the Isles”, this dram is thick with smoke and tangy sea air. Brilliantly smooth, it might just become your new favourite malt if you give it half a chance!
